reviewText: This could be one of the earliest interracial films created after The US Government finally passed ruling (early 1970's?) that interracial marriage was deemed legally acceptable for all 50 states. It revisits the hardships both black/ white romances may face, especially through social injustice and imbedded family prejudice. I hope that this worthwhile film "gem" doesn't become lost to time and is preserved someday to DVD video Something New (Widescreen Edition). Other worthwhile films falling within this similar genre: - Mama,There's A Man In My Bed (France)Romuald and Juliette ( Romuald et Juliette ) ( Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg. 2 Import - United Kingdom ] - Rum & Coke (US)Rum and Coke - Foreign Student (US)Foreign Student [VHS) - Secrets & Lies (UK)[[ASIN:B0006HBZD8 Secrets and Lies - Diva (France)Diva - Rachael Getting Married (US)Rachel Getting Married - Something New (US)Something New (Widescreen Edition) - Guess Who (US)Guess Who - Monster's Ball (US)Monster's Ball - Bodyguard (US)The Bodyguard (Special Edition) - Soul Man (US)Soul Man - Princess Tam Tam (Josephine Baker) (US)The Josephine Baker Collection (Zou Zou / Princess Tam Tam / Siren of the Tropics)- Island In The Sun (Dorothy Dandridge)(US) - A wake In Providence(US) - Away We Go (US)Away We Go [Blu-ray] - Cafe Au Lait (France) Cafe au Lait Youtube Video References: - Freshlyground- Pot Belly (2007)(So. Africa) - Tuck & Patti- Time After Time (1998 - Les Nubians- Les Portes du Souvenir (France) - True Love In Black & White - Haters 101 - Interracial Love...So Beautiful - Interracial Love, Black Women & White Men - Interracial Love In The Media (Parts 1&2) Anyone who wants to drop me a line regarding interracial (new or old) worthwhie music videos, shows and/or films, please feel free to let me know. Louis (prnj07064@yahoo.com) 3/25/10.
